resources.string:
Lazy Scientist II

This application was developed by the Dundee iGem 2012 team to encompass useful tools and utilities for those working in biological sciences, particularly synthetic biology. The program was written by Christopher Walker. 

To learn more about our project, please visit our online resources at the following addresses: 

http://dundeeigem.blogspot.co.uk 
http://2012.igem.org/Team:Dundee 

Note: The OD660 calculator is based on a MATLAB analysis of a set of data points produced within a laboratory environment. For accurate values, in-situ data should be produced with properly calibrated equipment. 

My warm thanks to Johnny Weightman for providing the OD600 and dilution equations, and helping me wrap my head around them! 

(This software is licensed under the GNU GPL 3 license, and you are welcome to modify and distribute the program provided the terms of the license are adhered to.) 

Any comments and ideas are welcomed, please email them to the author at 'kippy76@hotmail.co.uk'.
